metadata.Title: CVE-2018-6192 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In Artifex MuPDF 1.12.0, the pdf_read_new_xref function in pdf/pdf-xref.c allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (segmentation violation and application crash) via a crafted pdf file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-6192` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mupdf - 1.15.0+ds1-1
mupdf-tools - 1.15.0+ds1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mupdf package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.15.0+ds1-1').
